Legacy and Santon continued thier scan of Nightlight, the lights by
her bed=
 giving a rough approximation of what was going on in her
interior.

"Inter=
esting." Legacy said as he watched, his voice utterly calm and
controlled. =
"Her physical reactions are sedated but there is still
activity in there."
=

Santon pointed at another screen, "That is in reaction to the conflict
bet=
ween her two programs inside her." The Maximal medic frowned, "None
of us w=
ere designed to operate with two fully functioning personality
matrices."

=
"Confirmed." Legacy said as he watched his screen. "My screen also
shows a =
similar response patturn."

"What are we going to so now?" Bump, the third =
medically trained
Maximal said as he walked up to examine the screens.

"Ma=
trix deletion." Legacy said in cold tones.

Santon standing beside him nodd=
ed in agreement. "Perceptor was right."

Bump walked over to another panel =
and began programing in a few
commands. "This is going to take a moment, it=
 is not every day that we
attempt to delete personality profiles from a Spa=
rk." Bump frowned in
concentration, "Sparks are designed to resist exactly =
what we are
trying to do."

Legacy moved over to Bump's station, "I will as=
sist." he said as he
too began entering  commands. In the screen above them=
 a program was
swiftly being built. One created with a singular function: D=
elete
Nightlight's personality programs.

OOC: Did Perceptor stay in the ro=
om with Nightlight and the medics or
did he leave with the others?
